content.stem: (audio) What change was made to the man’s reservation?

choices.C: He was moved to another branch.

transcript.speaker: W
transcript.text: Did you book a hotel for your business trip?

transcript.speaker: M
transcript.text: Yes, but they changed my reservation to another branch.

transcript.speaker: W
transcript.text: Is it still close to the client’s office?

transcript.speaker: M
transcript.text: Yes, it’s just a five-minute walk.

content.rationale: He says they changed his reservation to another branch.
